title: Before I Go
description: Some roads, there are no turning back from.Fed up with his dead-end life, Michael travels to Mexico to get his hands on a drug known as, death in a bottle.His plan is simple, spend whatever money he has left, and enjoy his last days in style, that is until he meets someone at the hotel bar. A girl who came to Mexico in search of her missing sister who was kidnapped a year ago and was never seen again.Deciding this could be his one last good deed before he dies, Michael agrees to help her in the search to discover the truth, but as the unearth more than they bargain for, Michael may not be the only one with death in store.
author: Marie Reyes
